name: Rabbini
description:
This game is an entry to the Secret Santa Jam 2020 and a gift for Charlíe.

In this puzzle-platformer you and your clones work together to get one of you the goal. There are currently 9 levels with probably more to come.

I worked on this project for a month as game designer and programmer and was joined by cenyn, who made the art. You can find more of her amazing work here https://www.instagram.com/art_by_cenyn.
